response.headline: Global sunscreen recommendations by region with mattifying options for shine control
response.summary: Dr. Julian Sass provides region-specific sunscreen recommendations: East Asia features Beauty of Joseon and Isntree products, Australia highlights Cancer Council and Mecca options, Europe includes Eucerin and La Roche-Posay formulas, and USA mentions Naturium UV Reflect with mattifying alternatives for reducing shine.

extracted_text: East Asia: Beauty of Joseon Relief Sun Aqua Fresh, Biore UV Aqua Rich Aqua Protect Lotion, Isntree Onion Fresh Fluid Sun Cream, Kose Suncut UV Perfect Gel, Skin Aqua UV Super Moisture Essence Gold
Australia: Cancer Council Fluid Matte Invisible, Mecca Cosmetica To Save Face
Europe: Eucerin HydroProtect Dry Touch Gel Cream Oil Control Sun Allergy Protect, Garnier Ultra Light Sensitive, La Roche-Posay Anthelios Oil Control Gel Cream, Nivea Dark Spot Control Shine Control
USA: Naturium UV Reflect some mattifying sunscreens
Can you use mattifying powder to decrease the shine from sunscreen
image_details.key_interest: Comprehensive list of region-specific sunscreen product recommendations
